segments.text: Hello , could you tell me my test results ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your results are posted on the website . Just put in your password and you can see the exact numbers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you saying that all my results were normal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We always contact you by phone to come in if there is a need for follow-up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How will I know what the results mean on the website ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The purpose of each test is given on the site .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will the numbers mean anything to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The website will give you your results and then tell you what the normal range is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I see all of my test results at once ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you can see every test for the past five years . You can compare them .
segments.speaker: S2
